column5: Hi guys, For those concerned about the ice out around Kenora / LOTW. This website can be very helpful. Updates are posted to the site several times a week.https://icepatrol.wordpress.com Brett
Thanks for posting that, going up June 4 for my 8 year olds 1st trip and have been watching to see when ice out might be.
Here is a interactive site with up to date satellite images.https://zoom.earth/#49.353756,-84.74...,pm,2018-04-01
-27C with the wind tonight here in Winnipeg. Enough...
This is getting depressing, it snowed on and off today.
Starting to see progress the past few days, Bump for my favourite spring blog
